comment_text: What does it even mean for an XML layout to be type and null safe? This reads like a parody. XML resources give you orientation/screen size resolution and component re use. I haven't drunk the MVP kool aid that's the new hotness, but this is far too much in the other direction. If you're setting margins in code you're probably doing something wrong.
author: spbaar
story_title: Anko – Pleasant Android development in Kotlin
